attributes.action: Require universities to reimburse tuition fees for cancellations due to COVID-19
attributes.additional_details: Students already pay large fees to attend university. When classes are cancelled and content moved online or otherwise adapted students are paying for a service that they have not received. This is unfair and would not occur in any other industry.
attributes.background: This petition asks that that the Government apply pressure to universities throughout the UK so that the reduction in educational quality is matched by the reduction of fees.
